Project.name: PureMVC Standard for JavaScript
Project.Description: PureMVC is a lightweight framework for creating applications based upon the classic Model-View-Controller design meta-pattern. This is the specific implementation for the JavaScript language. The current version uses MooTools for simulation of class relationships.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Features in 2.0
  • Complete rewrite based on MooTools for class simulation.
  • Fully-functional port of the AS3 Standard Reference Version.
  • Complete documentation of all classes and methods.
  • Commented and Minified versions if the framework include file.
  • Box Splash demo (also fully documented).
  • Fully-functional port of the PureMVC AS3 Standard Reference Version.
As of 2.0, the Objs-based Port is Deprecated
  • The deprecated Objs-based port is still available on a branch.
    • Features in 1.0
    • Based on Objs framework for class simulation
    • Fully-functional port of the PureMVC AS3 Standard Reference Version.
    • Employee Admin demo fully reproduced.
Project.Installation:
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a PureMVC_JS_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\PureMVC_JS_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
